launch.question: When will UtilPay launch?
launch.answer: We're planning to launch in Q1 2026. Join our waitlist to be among the first to know and get early access.

providers.question: Which utility providers do you support?
providers.answer: We'll support all major utility providers in Serbia at launch, including EPS, Infostan, Telekom, and more. We're continuously adding new providers.

security.question: Is my payment information secure?
security.answer: Yes, we use bank-level encryption and never store your card details. All payments are processed through certified payment processors.

properties.question: Can I manage multiple properties?
properties.answer: Yes! Our Premium and Business plans support unlimited properties. Perfect for landlords and property managers.

free.question: Is there a free plan?
free.answer: Yes, our Free plan lets you manage 1 property with basic features. It's perfect for getting started.
